[[Third Age|T.A.]] early 28th century | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Eorl]] | parentage=[[Gram]] | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Fréaláf]] | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Hild''' was a noble woman of [[Rohan]]. ==History== Hild was the daughter of [[Gram|King Gram]], and sister of [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]]. Her son [[Fréaláf]] took the crown after the death of Helm and his two sons.{{App|Eorl}} ==Etymology== ''Hild'' is a poetic word in [[Old English]] for "battle". ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | | | DEO | | |DEO=[[Déor]]
